entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
